comment: I honestly don't even know what my grade is. The semester is over tomorrow and I have no idea what my grade is because she has not put in any grades. She gives 0 directions and takes SO long to respond to students and when she does it is not helpful at all. I would not recommend taking her. This class was MUCH harder than it should be.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Definitely would not recommend if there's other teachers available for the course. She's very adamant about writing a certain amount for each discussion post. No quizzes, lots of writing on different readings. We had to purchase a textbook that's only used in one assignment out of the 10+ assignments she gives.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Do not take this class unless you want to write six paragraphs a week... as a discussion post. The readings are difficult and ridiculously long. She made you purchase a book that you won't read pass the introduction. I do not recommend unless she is your last option, there are easier GWST courses.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT
